compliant.section: IFTTT takes the privacy of its users very seriously.
compliant.legal provisions: Data protection by design and by default, Security of processing

non_compliant.section: We encourage you to be aware when you leave the Service and to read the terms and conditions and privacy policy of each third party website or service that you visit or utilize.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to information, Right to access
non_compliant.amend: IFTTT should clearly inform users about the data transfer to third parties, the purpose of the transfer, and the legal basis for it. They should also provide users with a list of these third-party websites or services, along with their respective privacy policies.

non_compliant.section: IFTTT has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the Content, accuracy, privacy policies, or practices of or opinions expressed in any third party websites or by any third party that you interact with through the Service.
non_compliant.amend: IFTTT cannot completely disclaim responsibility for data processing by third parties, especially if they act as controllers or joint controllers. They need to implement appropriate safeguards, such as data processing agreements, to ensure GDPR compliance by these third parties.

non_compliant.section: In addition, IFTTT will not and cannot monitor, verify, censor or edit the Content of any third party site or service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, Data protection by design and by default
non_compliant.amend: While IFTTT might not be obligated to monitor all third-party content, they should have mechanisms in place to address potential GDPR violations, especially if they become aware of such violations.

non_compliant.section: By using the Service, you release and hold us harmless from any and all liability arising from your use of any third party website or service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Conditions applicable to child's consent in relation to information society services, Right to an effective judicial remedy against a controller or processor
non_compliant.amend: This liability waiver is too broad and might infringe on users' rights under the GDPR, especially regarding data breaches or unlawful data processing by third parties. IFTTT cannot completely waive its responsibility in such cases.

non_compliant.section: You should make whatever investigation you feel necessary or appropriate before proceeding with any online or offline transaction with any of these third parties.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The responsibility to ensure data protection should not solely lie with the user. IFTTT needs to provide clear and concise information about data processing activities, including those by third parties, to enable informed decisions.

non_compliant.section: You agree that IFTTT shall not be responsible or liable for any loss or damage of any sort incurred as the result of any such dealings.
non_compliant.amend: Similar to the previous point, IFTTT cannot completely disclaim liability for damages resulting from data processing activities, especially if they are responsible for the damage.

non_compliant.section: If there is a dispute between participants on this site, or between users and any third party, you agree that IFTTT is under no obligation to become involved.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
non_compliant.amend: While IFTTT might not be obligated to resolve disputes between users and third parties, they should provide a mechanism for users to lodge complaints regarding potential GDPR violations.

non_compliant.section: In the event that you have a dispute with one or more other users, you release IFTTT, its officers, employees, agents, and successors from claims, demands, and damages of every kind or nature, known or unknown, suspected or unsuspected, disclosed or undisclosed, arising out of or in any way related to such disputes and/or our Service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to an effective judicial remedy against a controller or processor
non_compliant.amend: This clause might limit users' rights to seek legal remedies against IFTTT for GDPR violations. IFTTT should clarify that this clause does not affect users' statutory rights under the GDPR.

non_compliant.section: If you are a California resident, you shall and hereby do waive California Civil Code Section 1542, which says: "A general release does not extend to claims which the creditor does not know or suspect to exist in his or her favor at the time of executing the release, which, if known by him or her must have materially affected his or her settlement with the debtor."
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to an effective judicial remedy against a controller or processor
non_compliant.amend: This waiver of California Civil Code Section 1542 might not be enforceable under the GDPR, as it could be seen as limiting users' rights to seek legal remedies for unknown data protection violations.

non_compliant.section: We’re always trying to improve the Service, so it may change over time. We may suspend or discontinue any part of the Service, or we may introduce new features or impose limits on certain features or restrict access to parts or all of the Service.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to information, Right to access
non_compliant.amend: IFTTT should inform users about any material changes to the Service that might affect their data processing. This includes providing clear and concise information about the changes and their potential impact on users' rights.

non_compliant.section: We’ll try to give you notice when we make a material change to the Service that would adversely affect you, but this isn’t always practical.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While providing notice for every change might not be feasible, IFTTT should strive to inform users about significant changes that might impact their data privacy. They should also provide a reasonable timeframe for users to understand and adapt to these changes.

non_compliant.section: Similarly, we reserve the right to remove any Content from the Service at any time, for any reason (including, but not limited to, if someone alleges you contributed that Content in violation of these Terms), in our sole discretion, and without notice.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
non_compliant.amend: IFTTT should provide users with the possibility to rectify inaccurate data or object to the processing of their data. Simply removing content without notice might infringe on users' rights under the GDPR, especially the right to erasure.
